snippet: People with osteoarthritis are increasingly choosing knee or hip replacement, but there are many potential remedies short of surgery to ease pain and to preserve - and perhaps restore - joint function.
abstract: People with osteoarthritis are increasingly choosing knee or hip replacement, but there are many potential remedies short of surgery to ease pain and to preserve - and perhaps restore - joint function.

headline.main: Relief for Joints Besieged by Arthritis
headline.print_headline: Personal Health: Relief Tips for Joints Besieged by Arthritis
